amendment.description: To amend title 18, United States Code, to protect judges, prosecutors, witnesses, victims, and their family members, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5217 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5217 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Specter. (consideration: CR 12/7/2006 S11387) To amend title 18, United States Code, to protect judges, prosecutors, witnesses, victims, and their family members, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5217 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Specter.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5217 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
